tasks.task_description: Find volume ID ending in ca0a
Attach volume ending ca0a to instance at /dev/xvdf
SSH to instance and mount the new volume

description: Detach volume 553a and attach/mount volume ca0a to instance i-0e49798a9353b7040
context: Found volume vol-0a3ba083c5427ca0a (30GB gp3, encrypted, available state, in ap-south-1a)
Detached vol-0d334eae30f90553a and attached vol-0a3ba083c5427ca0a at /dev/xvdf
Successfully mounted vol-0a3ba083c5427ca0a at /persistent. Device is /dev/nvme2n1 (30GB, 28% used with 21GB available). Contains home directory and lost+found.
